taskMan.resource

Class ResourcePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskMan.resource.ResourcePool

  • public class ResourcePool
extends java.lang.Object
    A resource pool is a collection of concrete resources based on one specific resource prototype
    Author:
    Tim Van Den Broecke, Joran Van de Woestijne, Vincent Van Gestel and Eli Vangrieken

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<ConcreteResource> concreteResList 
      private ResourcePrototype resProt 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourcePool(ResourcePrototype resPrototype)
      Construct a new resource pool with no concrete resources, based on a resource prototype

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourcePool

        public ResourcePool(ResourcePrototype resPrototype)
        Construct a new resource pool with no concrete resources, based on a resource prototype
        Parameters:
        resPrototype - | The prototype that will be used to create concrete resources for this resource type

    • Method Detail

      • getPrototype

        public ResourcePrototype getPrototype()
        A getter for the prototype of this resource pool
        Returns:
        the resource pool's prototype

      • createResourceInstance

        public boolean createResourceInstance(java.lang.String resName)
        Construct a new concrete resource in this pool with a given name
        Parameters:
        resName - | The name of the new resource instance
        Returns:
        True if the new resource was successfully created and added to the pool, false otherwise

      • getConcreteResourceList

        public java.util.List<ConcreteResource> getConcreteResourceList()
        Return a list of concrete resources in the pool
        Returns:
        an immutable list of concrete resource in the pool

      • hasAsPrototype

        public boolean hasAsPrototype(ResourcePrototype prototype)
        Check whether this resource pool is based on the given resource prototype
        Parameters:
        prototype - | The prototype to compare with
        Returns:
        True if this is the resource pool containing the prototype, False otherwise

      • size

        public int size()
        Determine the size of the pool
        Returns:
        the amount of the concrete resources in this pool
